sentence.Network_en: This may help to undermine the brittle truce that currently exists.
sentence.Network_cn: 这也许会火上浇油，破坏当前脆弱不稳的休战局面。

sentence.Network_en: The rebels may simply be using the truce to regroup their forces.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛军可能只想利用停火重新组织他们的军事力量。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 休字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 休业〖 suspendbusiness;becloseddown〗 休战〖 truce;armistice;ceasefire〗 休止〖 stop〗.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... truth n 事实，真理 truce n 休战，停战（相信对方而停战） truism n 不言自明的真理.

【资料】透特塔罗详解三 ... SORROW 悲伤 TRUCE 休止 DEFEAT 击败.

list.abs: 神圣休战（sacred truce）(Sacred Truce)识:无论战争进行得多么激烈，在竞技会前夕， 双方都应自动停止战事，实行“神圣休战（sacred truce）”。 在奥林匹克竞技会 …
奥林匹克誓言 Olympic oath奥林匹克休战 Olympic truce奥林匹克年 Olympic year
diplomatic envoy 外交使节diplomatic truce 外交休兵downright distrust 完全不信任
...圣诞节休战（Christmas truce）泛指发生于第一次世界大战期间的圣诞夜|平安夜或圣诞节|圣诞节中，德意志帝国|德国与大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国|英国或是德意志帝国|德国与法兰西第三共和国|法国军队间一些短暂且非官方的停火|休战，而狭义的圣诞节休战是指从1914年圣诞节延伸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English trewes, trues (plural), from Old English trēowa, plural of trēow 'belief, trust', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch trouw and German Treue, also to true

entry.def: A truce is an agreement between two people or groups of people to stop fighting or quarrelling for a short time.

example.ex: The fighting of recent days has given way to an uneasy truce between the two sides...
example.tran: 最近几天的交战结束了，双方达成了暂时的休战协议。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of peace agreed to between opponents so they can discuss peace terms

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since the truce, a simmering stalemate has prevailed.

auth_sentence.content: The truce call follows months of talks with Turkey.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托

means.word_mean: 休战, 停战(协定);停止争辩(的协议)

sentences.en: a truce between two warring sides
A truce was declared between the two armies.
A temporary truce had been reached earlier that year.
sentences.cn: 那年早些时候达成了暂时停火协定。

sentences.en: The hot weather gave the old man a truce from rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 热天使这位老人暂时免受风湿病之苦。
